channel.title: Problem letting people connect
channel.description:
Hello, I've got a problem, normally I search the forums for help but for this problem isn't stated anywhere. My problem is probably easy to solve but I still can't figure what I did wrong. I'm trying to let people join my no-ip server but people can't seem to connect. I've done the port forwarding thing: [img]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/4207/portforwadingbb1.jpg[/img] I've also let the port 43594 open: [img]http://img86.imageshack.us/img86/544/mindscapeya5.jpg[/img] My no-ip has also been correctly set up i think: [img]http://img166.imageshack.us/img166/9890/noipfm9.jpg[/img] Now when people try to connect, all they get is:
Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click "Cancel" then "Start Server" to make your own.
What can I do? :( Help me please. ~Thank you very much[br][size=1]Posted at: December 14, 2006, 06:43:56 AM[/size][hr]Please...

item.description:
@Dragonpurse wrote:

Hello,

I’ve got a problem, normally I search the forums for help but for this problem isn’t stated anywhere.
My problem is probably easy to solve but I still can’t figure what I did wrong.

I’m trying to let people join my no-ip server but people can’t seem to connect.
I’ve done the port forwarding thing:

I’ve also let the port 43594 open:

My no-ip has also been correctly set up i think:

Now when people try to connect, all they get is:

Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click “Cancel” then “Start Server” to make your own.

What can I do? Help me please.

~Thank you very much[br][size=1]Posted at: December 14, 2006, 06:43:56 AM[/size][hr]Please…
